turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I'd like to order an iced latte from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello, thanks for calling. Which Starbucks location would you like to pick up your drink from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks on White Lane and Stine Road in Bakersfield, California.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what kind of iced latte would you like to order from Starbucks today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want the Iced Blonde Vanilla Bean Coconutmilk Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what size would you like your latte to be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grade.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. There are a number of milk options, this particular drink usually comes with coconut milk. Would you like that or something different?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Coconut milk sounds good, let's go with that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, are there any customizations you would like to make before we move forward?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like the drink to have light ice.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, no problem! Would you like anything else with your Starbucks order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you, just the latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, to confirm, you're ordering an Iced Blonde Vanilla Bean Coconutmilk Latte with light ice. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Awesome, I've ordered your beverage with your information on file. Your order will be available for pickup soon at the Starbucks on White Lane and Stine Road.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thank you for your help today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome, your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that'll be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you for calling, goodbye!

items.name: Iced Blonde Vanilla Bean Coconutmilk Latte.
Iced Blonde Vanilla Bean Coconutmilk Latte
